Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2012 03:14AM MissRC wrote: I was 27 when I was diagnosed... this is my story. I felt a lump mid April 2011, went to my family Dr April 19th, they sent me to the radiologist where I had 2 ultrasounds, and 2 mamograms. The radoilogist then sugested a core needle biopsy. I had the biopsy done on April 26, and received the phone call on April 27th. I have DCIS, no lymphnodes affected. I had surgeries May 16th & May 24th, Chemo every 3 weeks from June 20th - October 3rd, Radiation every day (Mon-Fri) from November 1st - December 21st. My hair is starting to grow back, and I am hoping to be wigless in the next 2 months!
Posts.Title: How did you hear biopsy results--phone or appt? frazzledmom schoolmom

Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2012 03:45AM MissRC wrote: Tenmom: Because my tumor was 5cm it bumps me to 2b.
